thread.title: UAE participates in 32nd meeting of Arab Commission for the Unified Customs Tariff in Cairo
thread.title_full: UAE participates in 32nd meeting of Arab Commission for the Unified Customs Tariff in Cairo | MENAFN.COM

author: Emirates News Agency (WAM)
title: UAE participates in 32nd meeting of Arab Commission for the Unified Customs Tariff in Cairo
text:
(MENAFN - Emirates News Agency (WAM))The UAE is participating in the 32nd meeting of the Arab Commission for the Unified Customs Tariff in Cairo, which is being held at the General Headquarters of the Arab League under the chairmanship of Judge Abdul Aziz Al Mugiarah, Legal Adviser to the Saudi customs, in the presence of representatives of Arab customs authorities.

Tariq Abdullah Bourhima, Chairman of the Customs Affairs Department at the Federal Customs Authority, represented the UAE at the meeting.

Al Mugiarah said that the five-day meeting will discuss the stances of Arab countries to engage in the negotiation process of the Unified Customs Tariff according to the results of the previous meeting of the committee with an expert specialist in Customs Tariff's affairs at The World Trade Organisation, WTO.

The meeting also included a discussion on tariff structures, according to a database of the Arab League Secretariat, as well as special policies on customs negotiation and how to start the negotiation process on the Customs Tariff mechanism.
